name: Apple Cinnamon Breakfast Dish
ingredients: 1 tsp baking powder 4 cups sliced baking apples
1 beaten egg light cream or milk.
1 cup sugar (1 T. light Karo syrup for thicker consistency)
steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a medium bowl combine 2 cups flour, 1/2 cup sugar, salt and baking powder. Cut in butter
and stir in egg. Mixture will be fairly dry. Divide this mix in half and press 1/2 into a lightly greaed 9 x 13 inch pan.
In a seperate bowl combine 1/2 cup sugar, 1/4 cup flour, cinnamon and apples. Put over crust. Crumble remaining
dough over apples. Bake for 40 minutes. Cool. Frost with remaining ingredients: powdered sugar, vanilla, and milk.
In a saucepan, combine over medium heat:
Boil one minute. Take off heat and add:
½ cup pumpkin ½ tsp. salt
Combine all ingredients and make pancakes as usual. Serve with Buttermilk Syrup.
